Package functions.cursors

Class Cursor

java.lang.Object
functions.cursors.Cursor
public class Cursor extends Object
The Cursor class represents a drawing cursor with properties like position, angle, color, and thickness. The initial position and dimensions of the canvas are hardcoded.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Cursor(int id)
    Constructor to initialize a cursor with a specific ID.
